techmeme.title: A profile of Nick Pickles, who has recently been promoted to X's VP of global affairs; sources: Pickles has become the right-hand man to CEO Linda Yaccarino (Hannah Murphy/Financial Times)
Malaysia plans to require social and messaging apps to register for a renewable license starting late 2024; Singapore asks online platforms to curb scams (Nikkei Asia)
Sources: TikTok plans to launch TikTok Shop in Spain and Ireland as early as October; the rollout will be smaller than previously envisioned amid EU scrutiny (Bloomberg)
An investigation shows how pedophiles groom children using Roblox, a problem exacerbated by Roblox not collecting any personal information beyond a user's age (Bloomberg)
Cybersecurity startup Wiz walks away from a $23B Google acquisition; memo: CEO Assaf Rappaport told staff that Wiz would pursue an IPO as originally planned (CNBC)
